text:
e="preserve">Carlton D. Weekly (December 6, 1993 – August 4, 2020) better known as FBG Duck, was an American rapper. He was best known for his breakout single “Slide”. He was signed to the RECORDS division of Sony Music Entertainment. He was born in Woodlawn, Chicago, Illinois.
FBG Duck released his earliest music in 2011. His song "Slide" received over 53 million views on YouTube. A remix of the song featuring 21 Savage was released shortly afterwards. He was shortly thereafter signed to the RECORDS division of Sony Music Entertainment.
On August 4, 2020, Weekly was shot and killed in the Gold Coast district of Chicago in a shooting, as he was shopping. He was 26.
